sentences.en: John Harrison, a working-class joiner with relatively little education eventually won the prize after building a series of clocks, each improving on the previous one.
sentences.cn: 一个毫不起眼、没有受过多少教育的工匠，约翰·哈里森，最终凭借一系列的发明创造和不断改良，最终获得了这笔丰厚的奖金。

sentences.en: The joiner has a name for reliability.
The Joiner nailed a strip of wood on the door.
sentences.cn: 木匠把一块木条钉在门上.

sentences.en: The joiner shaved a thin strip off the edge of the door.
sentences.cn: 细木工把门檐刨掉薄薄一层.

sentences.en: The joiner's coming to fit the new door on next week.
sentences.cn: 木匠下星期要来把新门装上.

sentences.en: Work done by a joiner ; fine woodwork.
sentences.cn: 有细边的木工活用的 凿子.

words.tran_cn: 共同的；连接的；联合的，合办的
[木] 细木工业；细木工制品
关节；接缝；接合处，接合点；（牛，羊等的腿）大块肉
接洽人；接合物；刨接缝的长刨
连接，贴合；接合；使有接头

trans.tran_en: someone who makes wooden doors, window frames etc
